Name: Major Blaze
Description: Hailing from the pixelated planes of the WebtrES club, Major Blaze is an NFT with a chassis painted in the iconic rossoCorsa, symbolizing his passion and speed. Equipped with soldier-style buttons, he's always ready for action, with a strategic mind geared towards protecting the digital realm. His limbs are not ordinary; with rocket-powered arms and legs, Major Blaze can soar through cyberspace at incredible velocities, leaving a trail of fire-coded algorithms. The classic screen face displays an expression that is both charming and enigmatic, glinting with a spark of old-school charisma. Major Blaze is a guardian of the WebtrES club's virtual assets, an unsung hero in a world where valor is measured in bandwidth and bravery in bytes.
